dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Right, because sentimentality is part of the performance. It's a way to channel emotions that might otherwise be suppressed in such competitive fields.

dialogue_turns.text: So you're saying it's all an act? That these displays of love and devotion are just for show?
